thread.title: Starwood Hotels and Resorts debuts in South Australia
thread.title_full: Starwood Hotels and Resorts debuts in South Australia

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Starwood Hotels and Resorts debuts in South Australia
text:
Starwood Hotels and Resorts debuts in South Australia Adv: 
Jul 29, 2015 Adv: 
ADELAIDE, Australia - Starwood Hotels and Resorts has announced plans to debut in South Australia with Aloft Adelaide opening in the state capital. 
The hotel will feature 200 loft-like guestrooms, an indoor glass-bottomed rooftop pool, 24-hour fitness centre with rooftop running track, and 500 square metres of flexible meeting space. 
Ideal for business gatherings, the meeting space is complimented by a striking rooftop bar and lounge overlooking the city. Additionally, the Aloft brand’s signature WXYZSM bar will provide a buzzing, social spot for guests to sip on a cocktail while enjoying the best up-and-coming music acts as part of the brand’s signature ongoing music program.
